# Data setup

```{r setup}
DATA_PATH <- '../data'

# load data
red_wine <- read.csv(paste(DATA_PATH, 'winequality-red.csv', sep="/"), sep=';')
white_wine <- read.csv(paste(DATA_PATH, 'winequality-white.csv', sep="/" ), sep=';')
```
